ProcessTemplates.Name: Synchronize customers from Adobe Commerce/Magento to Salesforce
ProcessTemplates.Description: This process retrieves Customer data from Adobe Commerce (Magento). It performs the necessary mapping to Salesforce Contact format and then transfer the mapped Contacts to Salesforce

Process.Name: Synchronize customers from Adobe Commerce/Magento to Salesforce
Process.Description: This process retrieves Customer data from Adobe Commerce (Magento). It performs the necessary mapping to Salesforce Contact format and then transfer the mapped Contacts to Salesforce
